devdoc.details: A contract that validates research hypotheses using Chainlink services - Chainlink Functions for AI validation - Chainlink VRF for random badge assignment - Chainlink Automation for periodic validation checks

getResearcherHypotheses(address).details: Get all hypotheses for a researcher

requestBadgeAssignment(uint256).details: Request Chainlink VRF for random badge assignment

params.hypothesisId: The hypothesis ID to award badge for

submitHypothesis(string,string).details: Submit a new hypothesis for validation

devdoc.title: ChainlinkHypothesisValidator

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.
